trait.name: Gunslinger
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on Clay ranged attack rolls with a gun. In addition, he ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks.

trait.name: Hunter's Intuition.
entries: When Clay make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check, he can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

trait.name: Finder's Magic.
entries: Clay can cast the {@spell hunter's mark} spell with this trait. And, he can also cast the locate object spell with it. Once Clay cast either spell with this trait, he can't cast that spell with it again until finish a long rest.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance.
entries: When Clay are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he drop to 1 hit point instead. Clay can't use this feature again until finish a long rest.

trait.name: Dead Eye.
entries: When Clay score a critical hit with a ranged weapon attack, he can it maximizes the damage from this attack.

trait.name: Nimble Escape.
entries: The clay allison can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Fast Hands
entries: Clay can reload his weapon and drop bombs with his bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Clay pode realizar dois ataques com armas a distancia, três ataques com armas corpo a corpo leves e com propriedade acuidade.

action.name: Automatic Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 50/150 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hunting Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger of Blindsight
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.
This rare magic item requires attunement. A creature attuned to it gains blindsight out to a range of 30 feet. The dagger has a saw-toothed edge and a black pearl nested in its pommel.

action.name: End Of Line
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 240/240 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shotgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 15/60 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 2d12 + 15}) piercing damage.
If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Bomb {@recharge 4}
entries: Clay lights this bomb and drops it at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that spot must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take [[{@dice 3d6}]] fire damage.
